mapper.select: SELECT tg_c_resource.*,tg_c_resource.resource_name as text FROM tg_c_resource WHERE enabled = 1 AND type = 1 ORDER BY sort_order ASC
SELECT * FROM tg_c_resource WHERE enabled = 1 AND type = 1 AND parent_id = 0 ORDER BY sort_order ASC
SELECT tg_c_resource.*,tg_c_resource.resource_name as text FROM tg_c_resource WHERE enabled = 1 AND type = 1 AND parent_id = #{parentId} ORDER BY sort_order ASC

SELECT tg_c_resource.id FROM tg_c_resource WHERE enabled = 1 AND id in (SELECT resource_id FROM tg_c_role_resource WHERE role_id IN (SELECT ur.role_id FROM tg_c_user_role as ur WHERE ur.user_id = #{id})) ORDER BY sort_order ASC
SELECT permission FROM tg_c_resource WHERE enabled = 1
SELECT permission FROM tg_c_resource WHERE enabled = 1 AND id in (SELECT resource_id FROM tg_c_role_resource WHERE role_id IN (SELECT ur.role_id FROM tg_c_user_role as ur WHERE ur.user_id = #{id}))
SELECT *, resource_name as text FROM tg_c_resource ORDER BY code_num, sort_order ASC

SELECT resource.*,resource.resource_name as text ,r_s.role_id as role_id FROM tg_c_resource resource LEFT JOIN tg_c_role_resource r_s ON r_s.resourceId=resource.id and r_s.role_id=#{roleId} WHERE enabled = 1 ORDER BY sort_order ASC
SELECT id, resource_name as text, parent_id, permission, perm_value FROM tg_c_resource WHERE enabled = 1 ORDER BY sort_order ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE tg_c_resource SET resource_name = #{resourceName}, type = #{type}, code = #{code}, icon_cls = #{iconCls}, permission = #{permission}, perm_value = #{permValue}, sort_order = #{sortOrder}, description = #{description}, parent_id = #{parentId}, enabled = #{enabled}, update_data_time = #{updateDataTime}, update_data_username = #{updateDataUsername} WHERE id = #{id} AND editable = 1
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tg_c_resource WHERE id = #{id} AND editable = 1
mapper.select: SELECT editable FROM tg_c_resource WHERE id = #{id}
